title: The Twelve Spirits: Ugly Spirit - Novel Updates
author: Ye Xiao   叶笑
description:
‘I wish to become the happiest woman on this planet; to meet him at my happiest, then have him fall for me and paint my face for a lifetime.’ – Ning Xishi

Note: This is a short story that is part of a series, The Twelve Spirits, but can be read as a standalone.>
